# Features

in the sagittal plane the tibia displays these features:

1. Retrotorsion: A posterior bend @jonesProjectFoundations2025.
1. Retroversion: the tibial plateau shows a 5-6&deg; slope posteriorly @jonesProjectFoundations2025.
1. Retroflexion: a bend concave posteriorly @jonesProjectFoundations2025.
